channel.description: Recent content in general on Miro's World

item.title: From Jekyll to Hugo
item.description: I have decided to consolidate all piecemeal versions of my blogpost uder one roof and at the same to do these four things technology upgrade - from Jekyll to Hugo visual refresh of the page review tagging and categorization merge hidden posts from Wikis to one place Why Hugo replaced Jekyll The version 3 of my blog (see below for a bit of history) has been hosted on Github pages and using the default static site generators - Jekyll.

item.title: New image that expresses my new undefined job title
